metadata.name: Suspicious NTLM Authentication on the Printer Spooler Service
metadata.comment: Detects a privilege elevation attempt by coercing NTLM authentication on the Printer Spooler service

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rundll32.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\davclnt.dll,davsetcookie')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('spoolss')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('srvsvc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/print/pipe/'))))

output.summary: Detects a privilege elevation attempt by coercing NTLM authentication on the Printer Spooler service
